item.title: eSapiens's DEREK Module: Deep Extraction & Reasoning Engine for Knowledge with LLMs
item.description: arXiv:2507.15863v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: We present the DEREK (Deep Extraction & Reasoning Engine for Knowledge) Module, a secure and scalable Retrieval-Augmented Generation pipeline designed specifically for enterprise document question answering. item.title: Enhancing Hindi NER in Low Context: A Comparative study of Transformer-based models with vs. without Retrieval Augmentation
item.description: arXiv:2507.16002v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: One major challenge in natural language processing is named entity recognition (NER), which identifies and categorises named entities in textual input. In order to improve NER, this study investigates a Hindi NER technique that makes use of Hindi-spec...<br><br><small><strong>Source:</strong> arXiv | <strong>Keywords:</strong> retrieval, transformer, arxiv, study, GPT | <strong>Relevance:</strong> 100%</small>

item.title: mRAKL: Multilingual Retrieval-Augmented Knowledge Graph Construction for Low-Resourced Languages
item.description: arXiv:2507.16011v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Knowledge Graphs represent real-world entities and the relationships between them. Multilingual Knowledge Graph Construction (mKGC) refers to the task of automatically constructing or predicting missing entities and links for knowledge graphs in a mul...<br><br><small><strong>Source:</strong> arXiv | <strong>Keywords:</strong> retrieval, arxiv, RAG, experiment, context | <strong>Relevance:</strong> 100%</small>

item.title: LightRAG - "LightRAG: Simple and Fast Retrieval-Augmented Generation"

item.title: KAG - KAG is a logical form-guided reasoning and retrieval framework based on OpenSPG engine and LLMs. It is used to build logical reasoning and factual Q&A solutions for professional domain knowledge bases. It can effectively overcome the shortcomings of the traditional RAG vector similarity calculation model.
item.description: KAG is a logical form-guided reasoning and retrieval framework based on OpenSPG engine and LLMs. It is used to build logical reasoning and factual Q&A solutions for professional domain knowledge bases. It can effectively overcome the shortcomings of the traditional RAG vector similarity calculation model.<br><br><small><strong>Source:</strong> GitHub | <strong>Keywords:</strong> retrieval, LLM, framework, vector, knowledge base | <strong>Relevance:</strong> 100%</small>
item.author: noreply@contextengineering.news (GitHub)
